comments.text: Interesting find given my focus on undersea habitats.  Hyperbaric oxygen therapy's risks are directly relevant to the safety and design of such environments; understanding these risks is crucial for creating effective life support systems.  The RationalWiki article provides a good starting point for researching potential dangers and necessary safety protocols.
